property.name: 总是显示(ALWAYSSHOWSIZINGBAR)
property.description: TRUE if the sizing bar associated with the part and state should always be shown.

property.name: 自动尺寸(AUTOSIZE)
property.description: TRUE if the nonclient caption area associated with the part and state vary with text width.

property.name: 填充(BGFILL)
property.description: TRUE if true-sized images associated with the part and state are to be drawn on the background fill.

property.name: 边框(BORDERONLY)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state should only have its border drawn.

property.name: 合成(COMPOSITED)
property.description: TRUE if the control associated with the part and state will handle its own compositing of images.

property.name: 平面菜单(FLATMENUS)
property.description: Describes how menus are drawn. If TRUE, menus are drawn without shadows. If FALSE, menus have shadows underneath them.

property.name: 字形(GLYPHONLY)
property.description: TRUE if the glyph associated with the part and state should be drawn without a background.

property.name: 字形透明(GLYPHTRANSPARENT)
property.description: TRUE if the glyph associated with the part and state have transparent areas.

property.name: 整体尺寸(INTEGRALSIZING)
property.description: TRUE if the truesize image or border associated with the part and state must be sized to a factor of 2.

property.name: 镜像(MIRRORIMAGE)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state should be flipped if the window is being viewed in right-to-left reading mode.

property.name: 源缩放(SOURCEGROW)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state will scale larger in size if necessary.

property.name: 源变量(SOURCESHRINK)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state will scale smaller in size if necessary.

property.name: 均匀尺寸(UNIFORMSIZING)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state must have equal height and width.

property.name: 用户图片(USERPICTURE)
property.description: TRUE if the image associated with the part and state is based on the current user.

property.name: ACCENTCOLORHINT
property.description: The color used as an accent color hint for custom controls.

property.name: BLENDCOLOR
property.description: The color used as a blend color.

property.name: BORDERCOLOR
property.description: The color of the border associated with the part and state.

property.name: BORDERCOLORHINT
property.description: The color used as a border color hint for custom controls.

property.name: EDGEDKSHADOWCOLOR
property.description: The dark shadow color of the edge associated with this part and state.

property.name: EDGEFILLCOLOR
property.description: The fill color of the edge associated with this part and state.

property.name: EDGEHIGHLIGHTCOLOR
property.description: The highlight color of the edge associated with this part and state.

property.name: EDGELIGHTCOLOR
property.description: The light color of the edge associated with this part and state.

property.name: EDGESHADOWCOLOR
property.description: The shadow color of the edge associated with this part and state.

property.name: FILLCOLOR
property.description: The color of the background fill associated with the part and state.

property.name: FILLCOLORHINT
property.description: The color used as a fill color hint for custom controls.

property.name: GLOWCOLOR
property.description: The color of the glow for this part and state.

property.name: GLYPHTEXTCOLOR
property.description: The color that the font-based glyph associated with this part and state will use.

property.name: GLYPHTRANSPARENTCOLOR
property.description: The transparent glyph color associated with this part and state. If the GLYPHTRANSPARENT value for this part and state is TRUE, parts of the glyph that use this color are not drawn.

property.name: GRADIENTCOLOR1
property.description: The first color of the gradient associated with this part and state.

property.name: GRADIENTCOLOR2
property.description: The second color of the gradient.

property.name: GRADIENTCOLOR3
property.description: The third color of the gradient.

property.name: GRADIENTCOLOR4
property.description: The fourth color of the gradient.

property.name: GRADIENTCOLOR5
property.description: The fifth color of the gradient.

property.name: SHADOWCOLOR
property.description: The color of the shadow drawn underneath text associated with this part and state.

property.name: TEXTBORDERCOLOR
property.description: The color of the text border associated with this part and state.

property.name: TEXTCOLOR
property.description: The color of the text associated with this part and state.

property.name: TEXTSHADOWCOLOR
property.description: The color of the text shadow associated with this part and state.

property.name: TRANSPARENTCOLOR
property.description: The transparent color associated with this part and state. If the TRANSPARENT value for this part and state is TRUE, parts of the graphic that use this color are not drawn.

property.name: 基本类型(BGTYPE)
property.description: 这部分的基本绘图类型

property.name: BORDERTYPE
property.description: The type of border drawn if this part is a border fill.

property.name: CONTENTALIGNMENT
property.description: The alignment of text in the caption associated with this part.

property.name: FILLTYPE
property.description: The type of fill shape drawn if this part is a border fill.

property.name: GLYPHTYPE
property.description: The type of glyph drawn on this part.

property.name: GLYPHFONTSIZINGTYPE
property.description: The type of method used to select between different-sized glyphs.

property.name: HALIGN
property.description: The horizontal alignment if this part uses a true-size image.

property.name: ICONEFFECT
property.description: The type of effect to be displayed when this part is drawn using an effect.

property.name: IMAGELAYOUT
property.description: The type of alignment used when multiple images are drawn.

property.name: IMAGESELECTTYPE
property.description: The type of method used to select between sized images for this part.

property.name: OFFSETTYPE
property.description: The alignment of this part on the window.

property.name: SIZINGTYPE
property.description: The method used to size an image if this part uses an image file.

property.name: TEXTSHADOWTYPE
property.description: The type of shadow effect to draw behind text associated with this part.

property.name: TRUESIZESCALINGTYPE
property.description: The type of scaling used if this part uses a true-sized image.

property.name: VALIGN
property.description: The vertical alignment if this part uses a true-size image.

property.name: GLYPHIMAGEFILE
property.description: The glyph image associated with this part and state.

property.name: IMAGEFILE
property.description: The image associated with this part and state, or the image for multiple images associated with this part and state.

property.name: IMAGEFILE1
property.description: The first scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: IMAGEFILE2
property.description: The second scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: IMAGEFILE3
property.description: The third scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: IMAGEFILE4
property.description: The fourth scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: IMAGEFILE5
property.description: The fifth scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: IMAGEFILE6
property.description: The sixth scaled image associated with this part and state, for support of different resolutions.

property.name: GLYPHFONT
property.description: The font that the glyph associated with this part will be drawn with, if font-based glyphs are used.

property.name: ALPHALEVEL
property.description: The alpha value (0-255) used for effects.

property.name: ALPHATHRESHOLD
property.description: The minimum alpha value (0-255) that a pixel must have to be considered opaque.

property.name: BORDERSIZE
property.description: The thickness of the border drawn if this part uses a border fill.

property.name: GLYPHINDEX
property.description: The character index into the selected font that will be used for the glyph, if the part uses a font-based glyph.

property.name: GRADIENTRATIO1
property.description: The amount of the first gradient color (GRADIENTCOLOR1) to use in drawing the part. This value can be from 0 to 255, but this value plus the values of each of the GRADIENTRATIO values must add up to 255.

property.name: GRADIENTRATIO2
property.description: The amount of the second gradient color (GRADIENTCOLOR1) to use in drawing the part. This value can be from 0 to 255, but this value plus the values of each of the GRADIENTRATIO values must add up to 255.

property.name: GRADIENTRATIO3
property.description: The amount of the third gradient color (GRADIENTCOLOR1) to use in drawing the part. This value can be from 0 to 255, but this value plus the values of each of the GRADIENTRATIO values must add up to 255.

property.name: GRADIENTRATIO4
property.description: The amount of the fourth gradient color (GRADIENTCOLOR1) to use in drawing the part. This value can be from 0 to 255, but this value plus the values of each of the GRADIENTRATIO values must add up to 255.

property.name: GRADIENTRATIO5
property.description: The amount of the fifth gradient color (GRADIENTCOLOR1) to use in drawing the part. This value can be from 0 to 255, but this value plus the values of each of the GRADIENTRATIO values must add up to 255.

property.name: HEIGHT
property.description: The height of the part.

property.name: IMAGECOUNT
property.description: The number of state images present in an image file.

property.name: MINDPI1
property.description: The minimum dots per inch (dpi) that the first image file was designed for.

property.name: MINDPI2
property.description: The minimum dpi that the second image file was designed for.

property.name: MINDPI3
property.description: The minimum dpi that the third image file was designed for.

property.name: MINDPI4
property.description: The minimum dpi that the fourth image file was designed for.

property.name: MINDPI5
property.description: The minimum dpi that the fifth image file was designed for.

property.name: MINDPI6
property.description: The minimum dpi that the sixth image file was designed for.

property.name: PROGRESSCHUNKSIZE
property.description: The size of the progress control chunk shapes that define how far an operation has progressed.

property.name: PROGRESSSPACESIZE
property.description: The total size of all of the progress control chunks.

property.name: ROUNDCORNERHEIGHT
property.description: The roundness (0 to 100 percent) of the part's corners.

property.name: ROUNDCORNERWIDTH
property.description: The roundness (0 to 100 percent) of the part's corners.

property.name: SATURATION
property.description: The amount of saturation (0-255) to apply to an icon drawn using an effect.

property.name: TEXTBORDERSIZE
property.description: The thickness of the border drawn around text characters.

property.name: TRUESIZESTRETCHMARK
property.description: The percentage of a true-size image's original size at which the image will be stretched.

property.name: WIDTH
property.description: The width of the part.

property.name: TRANSITIONDURATIONS
property.description: The duration of each frame when doing a transition between two images.

property.name: CAPTIONMARGINS
property.description: The margins that define where caption text may be placed within a part.

property.name: CONTENTMARGINS
property.description: The margins that define where content may be placed within a part.

property.name: SIZINGMARGINS
property.description: The margins used for sizing a non-true-size image.

property.name: MINSIZE
property.description: The minimum size that the normal image file can be used for before moving to the next smallest image file.

property.name: MINSIZE1
property.description: The minimum size that the first small image file can be used for.

property.name: MINSIZE2
property.description: The minimum size that the second small image file can be used for.

property.name: MINSIZE3
property.description: The minimum size that the third small image file can be used for.

property.name: MINSIZE4
property.description: The minimum size that the fourth small image file can be used for.

property.name: MINSIZE5
property.description: The minimum size that the fifth small image file can be used for.

property.name: NORMALSIZE
property.description: The size of the normal image associated with this part.

property.name: OFFSET
property.description: The position offset from the alignment for this part. The alignment is defined by the OFFSETTYPE value.

property.name: TEXTSHADOWOFFSET
property.description: The offset from the text at which text shadows are drawn.

property.name: ATLASRECT
property.description: The placement and size of an image in the Aero map.

property.name: DEFAULTPANESIZE
property.description: The default size of the part.

property.name: HEIGHT
property.description: Image height.

property.name: WIDTH
property.description: Image width.

property.name: CAPTIONBARHEIGHT
property.description: Caption bar height.

property.name: CAPTIONBARWIDTH
property.description: Caption bar width.

property.name: MENUBARHEIGHT
property.description: Menu bar height.

property.name: MENUBARWIDTH
property.description: Menu bar width.

property.name: PADDEDBORDERWIDTH
property.description: Padded border width.

property.name: SCROLLBARHEIGHT
property.description: Scroll bar height.

property.name: SCROLLBARWIDTH
property.description: Scroll bar width.

property.name: SIZINGBORDERWIDTH
property.description: Width of a sizing border.

property.name: SMCAPTIONBARHEIGHT
property.description: Small caption bar height.

property.name: SMCAPTIONBARWIDTH
property.description: Small caption bar width.

property.name: CSSNAME
property.description: The name of the Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) file associated with the theme specified by the theme.

property.name: TEXT
property.description: The text displayed by the part.

property.name: XMLNAME
property.description: The name of the XML file associated with the theme specified by the theme.
